description: Creates a storage profile that specifies the operating system, file type, and file location of resources used on a farm.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: The unique token which the server uses to recognize retries of the same request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: farmId
parameters.description: The farm ID of the farm to connect to the storage profile.

parameters.name: displayName
parameters.description: The display name of the storage profile.

parameters.name: osFamily
parameters.description: The type of operating system (OS) for the storage profile.

parameters.name: fileSystemLocations
parameters.description: File system paths to include in the storage profile. (dict) --- The details of the file system location for the resource. The location name. The file path. The type of file.
